gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 120, Grizzlies 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Luka Doncic tallied his seventh consecutive 30+ point game as the Mavericks defeated the Grizzlies, 120-113. Luka Doncic led Dallas with 35 points, eight rebounds, and six assists as Dereck Lively added 16 points and 16 rebounds. Jaren Jackson Jr. led Memphis with a season-high 41 points as Desmond Bane totaled 28 points and eight assists. The Mavericks have now won three straight and improve to 14-8 as the Grizzlies move to 6-16.
